system.description: At 10th level, your knowledge of past civilizations and the things that ended them gives you insight into how to avoid their pitfalls and face their dangers. You may use a bonus action to make a history check against an aberration, celestial, construct, dragon, elemental, fey, fiend, giant, humanoid, or monstrosity with an intelligence of 8 or higher.  The DC of this check is 5 + the CR or level of the creature.  On a success, if you chose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.okthtwyohmh0eoa5]{Mystic Apprentice} as your Defensive Study, you may add your Intelligence modifier to one damage roll with any cantrip against that target for the next minute.  If you chose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.v4pkjilh484jph6i]{Precision Strikes}, you instead automatically benefit from it against that creature for the next minute without needing to spend a bonus action.  Once you use this ability, you may not do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
